title: Natural Explorer

Natural Explorer

Choose one of the following Features:Beast TamerUrban TrackerWasteland Wanderer: ColdWasteland Wanderer: FireWasteland Wanderer: Poison

Natural Explorer is a Ranger Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race,
